dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: How'd you get a tux at the last minute?

dialogue.speaker: PATRICK
dialogue.text: It's Scurvy's.  His date got convicted. Where'd you get the dress?

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: It's just something I had.  You know

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: Look, I'm  -- sorry -- that I questioned your motives.  I was wrong.
